name: Roc'h Arnev Island
description:
Go on an adventure and discover what really happened to your deceased grandfather. Will you solve the mystery or will you disappear like him?

The game will offer you a number of great locations to discover and lots of interesting lore and legends from Brittany (France).

If you get lost, use the spoiler free built-in hint system, it should help you find the solution all by yourself.
--------------------------------

This is a Flash game, it only works in a compatible browser such
as Firefox (it does not play in Chrome). Also the Flash plugin needs to
be downloaded and enabled in your browser.

The file is quite heavy, please wait for it to load.

---------------------------------------

Buttons:
"?" - spoiler free hints (in right bottom corner)
"H" - show all hotspots (in right bottom corner)
"T" - change font to more readable (in main menu left bottom corner)
--------------------------------
game design, graphics, music & developpment by axoona
